data.title: Sandy Martinez Career Stats
data.meta_description: Complete career MLB stats for the Miami Marlins Catcher Sandy Martinez on ESPN. Includes games played, hits and home runs per MLB season.
data.text:
Woo pitches seven strong innings, Mariners score twice in sixth and beat the Giants 4-3

â€” Bryan Woo pitched seven strong innings, and the Seattle Mariners capitalized on two hit batters in the sixth to score twice and beat the San Francisco Giants 4-3 on Sunday.

Top Nationals prospect Dylan Crews to make MLB debut vs. Yankees

Outfielder Dylan Crews, ranked by ESPN as the No. 5 prospect in MLB entering this season, will make his debut for the Nationals vs. the Yankees on Monday.
